channel.title: Oz Media Guru News
channel.description: News of what the Oz Media Guru team are providing to their customers

item.title: 29 March 2015 - Kodi upgrade now available via OMG Utilities - please check forums for more details
14 March 2015 - Sports Update Available - Total revamp - Check OMG Utils
1 March 2015 - Oz Media Guru March 2015 New Upgrade Released - Details on www.media-guru.com.au/forum
item.author: neil@media-guru.com.au
item.description: Oz Media Guru would like to present our new upgrade for March 2015. This upgrade contains a couple of new addons. The first VDubT25. This provides a lot of TV channels. We're particularly interested in the sporting ones. They typically provide a set of specific channels when a particular match or event are on and are normally of pretty high quality. The static channels sometimes work but it is definitely worth looking out for especially if you're after English and European soccer. The second addon is our very own addon. This is more of a utility addon. It is the new way to upgrade your box - you no longer have to download the upgrade to your computer and then transfer to the MG box. It will download to the box and then automatically install. We will be providing all future upgrades this way. You will need your MG forum username and password to access it and it will only work on the first box the upgrade is attempted on.
